sentences.en: Conclusion the genetic diversity of the population analyzed is very ample.
sentences.cn: 结论该群体的遗传多样性很丰富.

sentences.en: Conservationists are mostly wedded to preserving diversity in nature.
sentences.cn: 自然环境保护主义者大多致力于保持物种的多样性。

sentences.en: Decentralized organization has become commonplace, aided by computer - augmented control systems that make diversity more manageable.
sentences.cn: 分散经营管理的组织已很普遍, 借助于由计算机增强了的控制系统,使得分散管理更为可行.

sentences.en: Diversity is a hallmark of the renewable energy development.
sentences.cn: 再生能源发展的特点是多元化.

sentences.en: Export diversity, for example, should be its target.
sentences.cn: 例如, 出口多样化应当成为它的目标.

sentences.en: His object is to gather as great a diversity of material as possible.
sentences.cn: 他的目标就是尽可能多地搜集各种材料。

sentences.en: Is it discharging its duty to diversity by printing snippets of opinion from unqualified readers?
sentences.cn: 难道通过刊登不懂行的读者的片断见解就算尽到了应有多样性见解的职责了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Many employers seek diversity in their staffs.
sentences.cn: 很多雇主寻求雇员的多样性。

sentences.en: the biological diversity of the rainforests
sentences.cn: 热带雨林的生物多样性

sentences.en: The cultivated soybean is an erect, bushy annual plant of great morphological diversity.
sentences.cn: 栽培大豆是一种直立 、 丛生、形态变化很大的一年生植物.

sentences.en: The diversity and richness of the Bible as literature, especially the old Testament, are unparalleled.
sentences.cn: 作为一部文学作品,《圣经》, 特别是《旧约》的丰富多彩, 是前所未有的.

sentences.en: They prospered in their diversity more than in uniformity.
sentences.cn: 他们的兴旺,与其说是得力于整齐划一,不如说是得力于参差错落.

sentences.en: Two of our greatest strengths are diversity and community.
sentences.cn: 我们最大的两个优势是多样性和团体精神。

sentences.en: We also recognize the diversity and complexity of controlling in fluences in estuaries.
sentences.cn: 我们也认识到在河湾内控制影响的多样性和复杂性.

sentences.en: We have nothing against diversity; indeed, we want more of it.
sentences.cn: 我们一点都不抵触多样化；实际上，我们需要多样性更丰富一些。

words.tran_cn: 不同种类的，各式各样的
不同的；多种多样的；变化多的
使多样化，使变化；增加产品种类以扩大

phrases.tran_cn: 多样性指数；歧异度指数
生态多样性；生态分岐度

trans.tran_cn: 多样性，多元性，差异，不同
trans.tran_en: the fact of including many different types of people or things
